question: What are the device requirements?
answer:
• Only mobile devices are allowed.
• Tablets, emulators, or other external devices are strictly prohibited.
• Ensure your device meets the minimum specifications for smooth gameplay.

question: What is the team composition rule?
answer:
• Each team must consist of 4 players.
• A minimum of 3 players is required to participate in a match.
• Players can only represent one team during the tournament.

question: What maps and game mode will be used?
answer:
• All matches will be played in TPP mode unless specified otherwise.
• Maps include Erangel, Miramar, Sanhok, or Vikendi, as decided by the organizers.
